entry.name: Speedhack [Red]
entry.comment: A to Poke B to Disable

entry.name: Mini High Jump [ShadowBlue4]
entry.comment: A to Poke B to Disable

entry.name: XYZ Coordinate Modifier[ASH]
entry.comment: Use DPAD for X and Z Coordinates. Use X button for Y Coordinate.

entry.name: Player Teleportation [Povlur & Julia]
entry.comment: + To Set Location - To Load Location

entry.name: Woomy Teleportation [Mega-Mew] [Pirlo]
entry.comment: A To Set Location B To Superjump to Location

entry.name: Player Stalking [Axel] [Red]
entry.comment: D-Pad L to Stalk to P1 D-Pad Down to Stalk to P2 D-Pad Right to Stalk to P3 D-Pad Up to Stalk to P4 Y to Stalk to P5 B to Stalk to P6 A to Stalk to P7 X to Stalk to P8

entry.name: Team Changer [ASH]
entry.comment: D-Pad Left for Alpha D-Pad Right for Bravo (Can crash the game easily.)

entry.name: Cover Everything in Squid Form [Multiple People]
entry.comment: A to Activate B to Disable

entry.name: Ink Tank Modifier [Red]
entry.comment: "00120088 0000000X" X : 0 = Normal Ink Tank 1 = Lv0 Ink Tank 2 = Lv1 Ink Tank 3 = Lv2 Ink Tank 4 = Lv3 Ink Tank 5 = Octoling Ink Tank

entry.name: Shooter & Blaster Rapidfire [ItsOcto]
entry.comment:
Breaks all other weapons. Also gives you infinite ink. :)
A to Activate B to Disable

entry.name: Live Weapon ID Changer [Red]
entry.comment: "00120078 000000XX" XX: FFFFFFFF - No Weapon 00 = Sploosh - O - Matic 01 = Neo Sploosh - O - Matic 02 = Sploosh - O - Matic 7 03 = Splattershot Jr. 04 = Custom Splattershot Jr. 05 = Splash - O - Matic 06 = Neo Splash - O - Matic 07 = Areospray MG 08 = Areospray RG 09 = Areospray PG 0A = Splattershot 0B = Tentatek Splattershot 0C = Wasabi Splattershot 0D = Hero Shot Replica 0E = Octoshot Replica 0F = .52 Gal 10 = .52 Gal Deco 11 = N Zap 85 12 = N Zap 89 13 = N Zap 83 14 = Splattershot Pro 15 = Forge Splattershot Pro 16 = Berry Splattershot Pro 17 = .96 Gal 18 = .96 Gal Deco 19 = Dual Squelcher 20 = Custom Blaster 21 = Range Blaster 22 = Custom Range Blaster 23 = Grim Range Blaster 24 = Rapid Blaster 25 = Rapid Blaster Deco 26 = Rapid Blaster Pro 27 = Rapid Blaster Pro Deco 28 = L-3 Nozzlenose 29 = L-3 Nozzlenose D 2A = H-3 Nozzlenose 2B = H-3 Nozzlenose D 2C = Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose 2D = Carbon Roller 2E = Carbon Roller Deco 2F = Splat Roller 30 = Krak-On Splat Roller 31 = CoroCoro Splat Roller 32 = Hero Roller Replica 33 = Dynamo Roller 34 = Gold Dynamo Roller 35 = Tempered Dynamo Roller 36 = Inkbrush 37 = Inkbrush Nouveau 38 = Permanent Inkbrush 39 = Octobrush 3A = Octobrush Nouveau 3B = Classic Squiffer 3C = New Squiffer 3D = Fresh Squiffer 3E = Splat Charger 3F = Kelp Splat Charger 40 = Bento Splat Charger 41 = Hero Charger Replica 42 = Splatterscope 43 = Kelp Splatterscope 44 = Bento Splatterscope 45 = E-Liter 3K 46 = Custom E-Liter 3K 47 = E-Liter 3K Scope 48 = Custom E-Liter 3K Scope 49 = Bamboozler MK I 4A = Bamboozer MK II 4B = Bamboozler MK III 4C = Slosher 4D = Slosher Deco 4E = Soda Slosher 4F = Tri-Slosher 50 = Tri Slosher Nouveau 51 = Sloshing Machine 52 = Sloshing Machine Neo 53 = Mini Splatling 54 = Zink Mini Splatling 55 = Refurbrished Mini Splatling 56 = Heavy Splatling 57 = Heavy Splatling Deco 58 = Heavy Splatling Remix 59 = Hydra Splatling 5A = Custom Hydra Splatling --- 5B = Hero Shot Lv0 5C = Hero Shot Lv1 5D = Hero Shot Lv2 5E = Hero Shot Lv3 5F = Hero Roller 60 = Hero Charger 61 = BigBall??? 62 = BigBall??? 63 = Octoshot Lv0 64 = Octoshot Lv1 65 = Octoshot Lv2 66 = Octoshot Lv3 67 = Roller_Kingsquid

entry.name: Live Sub Weapon ID Changer [Red]
entry.comment:
Sub weapons:
00 = Splat Bomb 01 = Sucction Bomb 02 = Burst Bomb 03 = Seeker 04 = Point Sensor 05 = Ink Mine 06 = Sprinkler 07 = Squid Beakon 08 = Splash Wall 09 = Disruptor FFFFFFFF = None

entry.name: Sub-Weapon Rapidfire [Secret] [ASH]
entry.comment: L Button = Activate

entry.name: Splat Bomb Insta-Cover [Red]
entry.comment: A Button = Activate B Button = Disable

entry.name: Sprinkler Control [??? - Was on Computer]
entry.comment: Controls: A to move up B to move down D-Pad to move around

entry.name: Zero Gravity Bombs [Aurum]
entry.comment: A to activate. B to disable.

entry.name: Special Swapper: Inkzooka/Inkstrike/Killer Wail/Bubbler [Red]
entry.comment: D-Pad L = Inkzooka D-Pad Down = Killer Wail D-Pad R = Inkstike D-Pad Up = Bubbler

entry.name: Special Swapper: Bomb Rush/Kraken/Echo/Shachihoko [Red]
entry.comment: Y = Bomb Rush B = Kraken A = Echo X = Shachihoko

entry.name: Octoling Gender Modifier [DarkMew]
entry.comment: A to Poke Female B to Poke Male Y to Poke Octoling

entry.name: SRL Gear for the Player [Red]
entry.comment: Use + to poke it during the black screen intermission.

entry.name: SRL Gear for Octolings [Red]
entry.comment: Use - to poke during the black screen intermission.

entry.name: Player Suicide [Pirlo]
entry.comment: Click the L Stick to make your inkli- ng instantly die.

entry.name: AlphaHax [Red]
entry.comment: + to Activate - to Disable

entry.name: Beta Inkling
entry.comment: A to Poke B to Disable

entry.name: Unwinnable SplatZones [Pirlo]
entry.comment: Only works if your Player 1, or the PB host.

entry.name: Match TimerHax [???]
entry.comment:
Start = 10 Minute Match Select = 5 Second Match DPAD + UP + X = Infinite Match
Only works if you're the host/P1.

entry.name: VsGame Poke [Modetester Peeps]
entry.comment: Recon a Map > Exit > Poke this code > Inventory > Test out a Weapon

entry.name: Force VsGame Bots at your Coords
entry.comment: L Button to Activate.

entry.name: Camera Control [Aurum] [ASH]
entry.comment: Toggle with TV Button: A to go Up B to go Down D-Pad to Move Around & L to go faster
